title: Composition: as pattern, as structure, as expression
creator_credit: Eve Cotton and Center for Humanities
brief_description: The arrangement of the elements within a painting is examined. The program shows how the masters have organised their paintings according to the principles of good composition: pattern, from Gozzoli to Matisse; structure, from Pollaiuolo to Cezanne; expression, from Sassetta to Degas.
